items.snippet: China imposes export controls on 20 Japanese entities to curb ‘remilitarisation’  ReutersChina issues dual-use blacklist of 20 Japanese entities  The Japan TimesChina restricts exports to 40 Japanese entities with ties to military  NPRChina restricts exports to Japanese companies to curb 'remilitarization'  Nikkei AsiaChina adds Japanese entities to export control list, turning up heat on Tokyo  South China Morning PostMOFCOM restricts exports to 40 Japanese entities over military ties; Move a stepped-up response to security policy shift in the country: experts  Global TimesChina adds Subaru, Mitsubishi, TDK and 17 other Japanese entities to export-control watchlist  digitimesChina adds 20 Japanese entities to export control watch list to curb 're-militarization'  China DailyChina acts against 40 Japanese entities over military ties  The Japan Times
